archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Suggest Available Capacity Adjustment
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Suggest adjustments to planned or actual capacity based on monitoring results.

properties.value: Suggest Available Capacity Adjustment determines what planned or actual capacity adjustments to suggest based on monitoring results. These are communicated to the Adjust Capacity process. For example, an increase in sales may mean that planned (if sales are expected to increase in the future) and actual capacity needs to be increased; a decrease in sales may mean that planned and actual capacity should be reduced.
